subject: Public notice relating to fee collection
text: Hdiq 7elv THTf]5ifeta5rut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (436 R7367 37 {ArT r3reta) Exin. 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110045 NHAI13013/3/02-03/CMD-CO/Policy on Toll May 2003 Circular No_NHALCommercial Qperation/4 Sub: Public Notice Relating to Fee Collection. Reference Circular No. NHAI / Commercial Operation/ 22 dated 1]th   July 2003 regarding public notice before commencement of fee collection: It is further clarified that such public notice is not required in case the new Gazette Notification is only for continued collection of fee due to expiry of the period mentioned in the earlier  notification, unless there are other changes in the fresh notification- Such  changes may include  changes in rates, type of vehicle, exempted category of vehicle, plaza locations, chainage and concession to frequent users etc. Under any circumstances, upon publication of new notification, the number and date of new notification must be changed in all relevant places including on the display boards- Please ensure compliance This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority- Kls (M M Lohia) General Manager (CO) All PIUs | CMUs to: All Members/ CGMs/ CVO / GMs/TAG/ Counsel PS to Chairman Chief Engineer (PIC)_ MoRT&H, New Delhi for information _ 2:ImmlohiaineelamIGC Ahncdabad.doc &uH Nhal 29th To, Copy
